notchify.configScreen.title: Notchify Mod Config
notchify.configScreen.setting.anvilEnabl: Allows to create enchanted golden apples on anvil using xp and an optional item.
notchify.configScreen.setting.enchanting: Allows to enchant golden apples on enchanting table same way as tools, weapons and armor.
notchify.configScreen.setting.appleEncha: Amount of XP levels that player will need to create enchanted golden apple on anvil. This value also influences chance of enchantment when using enchantment table. Be aware that setting this value over 39 will make it impossible to make enchanted golden apples due to vanilla limitation. To circumvent this you can use Anvil Fix mod.
notchify.configScreen.setting.creativePl: If enabled, players in creative mode always can enchant with 100% chance.
notchify.configScreen.setting.survivalPl: If enabled, all players can enchant with 100%.
notchify.configScreen.setting.enchanting: Modifies the chance of enchanting a golden apple.
notchify.configScreen.setting.goldenAppl: If enabled, golden apple can disappear when golden apple enchanting fails.
notchify.configScreen.setting.vanishingC: If enchanting fails golden apple disappears with this chance.
notchify.configScreen.setting.appleBecom: If enchanting succeeds, enchanted golden apple can come out cursed.
notchify.configScreen.setting.curseChanc: If enchanting succeeds, enchanted golden apple can come out cursed with this chance.
notchify.configScreen.setting.secondaryI: If enabled, creating an enchanted golden apple on anvil requires second item.
Item that player has to combine golden apple with to get enchanted golden apple.
The amount of second item player has to combine to create enchanted golden apple.
If enabled, NBT tags for second item can be specified.
NBT tags that second item has to have.
notchify.configScreen.setting.grindingEn: If enabled, enchanted golden apple can be converted back into golden apple.
notchify.configScreen.setting.grindingXp: Multiplier for the amount of xp points player gets un-enchanted.
notchify.configScreen.setting.cursedAppl: If enabled, cursed enchanted golden apples can give side effects.
notchify.configScreen.setting.statusEffe: Effects below will occur if cursed apple is consumed.
Duration of this effect in ticks.
Amplifier is one less than the level of this effect.
